text:
Flying squad sleuths seized a sum of Rs.50,000 from a Madurai-based man, involved in the business of sinking borewells, here at Thoppur toll gate in the early hours of Monday.

The cash was carried by Shekar in his car, for fuel for his lorry that was commissioned for the sinking of borewell in Krishnagiri. The cash was seized by the authorities, subject to production of supporting papers.
title: Cash seized
